references: Related: CF 236789. Repealing: Ord 85340, Ord 85490, Ord 85811, Ord 85896, Ord 85936, Ord 86085, Ord 86180, Ord 86219, Ord 86570, Ord 86930, Ord 87066
summary: An ordinance abandoning the unexpended balances in certain appropriations made from the Sewer Fund and repealing the ordinances making such appropriations.
